title: On the Arizona Trail: A Guide for Hikers, Cyclists, and Equestrians
description: This first guide to the trail's completed sections and proposed routes is written for all trail users -- hikers, mountain bikers, equestrians, and animal packers. Includes vital information on types of terrain, camping, wildlife viewing, livestock outfitters, backcountry safety, and directions to trailheads. B&W photos, maps.
author: Tighe Kelly
